core/component.description:
* Base Component Class
 * 
 * Provides a foundation for all GitHound web components with lifecycle management,
 * event handling, and dependency injection capabilities.

core/registry.description:
* Component Registry
 * 
 * Manages component registration, dependency resolution, and initialization order.

core/event-bus.description:
* Event Bus
 * 
 * Global event system for component communication.

core/state-manager.description:
* State Manager
 * 
 * Global state management for the GitHound application.

core/app.description:
* Main Application Component
 * 
 * Orchestrates all other components and manages the overall application lifecycle.

core/lazy-loader.description:
* Lazy loading system for GitHound components
 * Provides dynamic import and on-demand loading capabilities

auth/auth-manager.description:
* Authentication Manager Component
 * 
 * Manages user authentication, registration, and session management.

search/search-manager.description:
* Search Manager Component
 * 
 * Manages search operations, history, and templates.

ui/theme-manager.description:
* Theme Manager Component
 * 
 * Manages application themes and visual preferences.

ui/notification-manager.description:
* Notification Manager Component
 * 
 * Manages application notifications and alerts.

ui/accessibility-manager.description:
* Accessibility Manager for GitHound
 * Provides comprehensive accessibility features and WCAG compliance

websocket/websocket-manager.description:
* WebSocket Manager Component
 * 
 * Manages WebSocket connections with automatic reconnection and authentication.

utils/export-manager.description:
* Export Manager Component
 * 
 * Manages data export functionality for search results.

dev/debug-panel.description:
* Development Debug Panel for GitHound
 * Provides component inspection, state monitoring, and debugging tools
